original_text:
He has taken away the covering of Judah.
In that day you looked to the weapons of the House of the Forest,
korean_text: 그가 유다에게 덮였던 것을 벗기매 그 날에야 네가 수풀 곳간의 병기를 바라보았고

sentences.original_text: He has taken away the covering of Judah.
you looked to the weapons of the House of the Forest,
